long_description: Small, light and bright, the Petzl Zipka Headlamp will accompany you wherever you go. Its retractable cord makes it extremely compact, and its bright 80-lumen LED lights up objects 40m away. Retractable cord allows the headlamp to be worn on your head or your wrist, or attached to any other support, such as a tent pole or bike seatpost. Single high-output LED provides even, white lighting throughout your field of vision with no blank spots in the beam; lens optimizes the reach of the beam to 40m. Push-button switch easily changes between high and low output settings so you can choose the appropriate light level for the task at hand. LED outputs 80 lumens on high and 20 lumens on low; throws light 40m on high and 20m on low. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up 120 hrs. of run time on low and 60 hrs. on high; compatible with rechargeable NiMH and lithium batteries. Petzl Zipka Headlamp battery case opens easily for changing the batteries. IPX4 water resistance offers protection against sprayed water.
short_description: Small, light and bright, the Petzl Zipka Headlamp will accompany you wherever you go. Its retractable cord makes it extremely compact, and its bright 80-lumen LED lights up objects 40m away.
